responsibilities: Create awareness through thought-provoking research that educates AI developers
Shape initial ideas that turn into larger research projects based on holes in industry knowledge and recently developed or released AI models
Execute research in weeks, not months
Practice the idea of both rigor and review but do it at speeds that are 10x faster than typical research
Write up research for social media posts, blogs, and external events
Plan and speak at Arize-hosted and industry events and conferences on research you are working on
Build an AI Twitter research presence that speaks to the AI community through social channels
qualifications: Working knowledge of generative AI, machine learning, and data science
Technical experience with the LLM app development stack (e.g., agents, orchestration frameworks, vector databases, evaluation libraries) with proficiency in Python
Ability to ideate and deliver on novel activities that earn the attention and trust of AI/ML practitioners
Self-learning ability and comfort with technical complexity
analysis: The job responsibilities include creating awareness through research that educates AI developers, shaping research projects based on recently developed or released AI models, and building a presence in the AI community. These tasks suggest a focus on cutting-edge AI technologies, which likely includes Generative AI and language models. The skills required for the job further support this inference. The job requires working knowledge of generative AI, machine learning, and data science, as well as technical experience with the LLM app development stack, which explicitly mentions agents, orchestration frameworks, and vector databases. These are components commonly associated with the development and deployment of language models. The combination of responsibilities and skills clearly indicates that the job involves working with Generative AI and language models.
